qas.question: Are records generally out of print as of date?

answers.text: Vinyl records continue to be manufactured and sold today
Many popular new albums are given releases

qas.question: What types of vinyl hold the most popularity?
Does vinyl record maintain any popularity?

context: In spite of their flaws, such as the lack of portability, <a3_0>records still have enthusiastic supporters<a3_0/>. <a0_0>Vinyl records continue to be manufactured and sold today<a0_0/>, especially by independent rock bands and labels, although record sales are considered to be a niche market composed of audiophiles, collectors, and DJs. <a2_0>Old records and out-of-print recordings<a2_0/> in particular are in much demand by collectors the world over. (See Record collecting.) <a1_0>Many popular new albums are given releases<a1_0/> on vinyl records and older albums are also given reissues, sometimes on audiophile-grade vinyl.
